sentence.Network_en: The eighth commandment is "Thou shalt not steal".
Is there any need to enforce that commandment by violence?
sentence.Network_cn: 难道实行这条诫命还需要使用暴力 吗 ?

sentence.Network_en: Honesty is also a commandment God gave to us.
sentence.Network_cn: 诚实也是神给我们的诫命.

指挥(command)：对各层各类人员的领导或指导。协调(coordinate)：促进协作，搞好衔接，消除矛盾。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French comandement, from comander 'to command' (see command)

entry.def: The Ten Commandments are the ten rules of behaviour which, according to the Old Testament of the Bible, people should obey.

example.ex: The eighth commandment is 'Thou shalt not steal'.

auth_sentence.content: There is none other commandment greater than these'.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is none other commandment greater than these'.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is none other commandment greater than these'.

auth_sentence.content: The fifth commandment requires that children honor their parents.
auth_sentence.res_content: The fifth commandment requires that children honor their parents.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The fifth commandment requires that children honor their parents.

auth_sentence.content: The ninth commandment is never talk too much.
auth_sentence.res_content: The ninth commandment is never talk too much.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The ninth commandment is never talk too much.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"具体物"; 2. 表名词,"行为或结果等"

stems_affixes.word_buile: allure吸引+ment具体物→n.诱惑物
embank筑堤+ment具体物→n.堤防,筑堤
equip装备+ment具体物→n.设备,器材,装置;才能
gar装饰3+ment表名词→装饰的东西,衣服
nourish提供养分+ment具体物→n.食物,营养品
oint=oil油+ment具体物→n.油膏,软膏
pave铺路+ment具体物→n.人行道
seg切,割+ment具体物→n.段,片,节,部分
achieve完成,达到+ment行为或结果等→n.成就,功绩
argu+ment行为或结果等→n.争论,辩论,论据
command命令+ment行为或结果等→n.戒律

stems_affixes.value_cn: 意见不同,不调和,争执,不和,争论
stems_affixes.word_buile: disagree有分歧;不一致+ment行为或结果等→n.意见不同,不调和,争执,不和,争论
embezzle盗用+ment行为或结果等→n.贪污,侵吞
embody体现+ment行为或结果等→embodiment
enact实施,颁布+ment行为或结果等→n.设定,制定

stems_affixes.value_cn: 建立,设立,建立的机构[或组织]
stems_affixes.word_buile: establish建立+ment行为或结果等→n.建立,设立,建立的机构[或组织]
fulfill完成+ment行为或结果等→n.完成,履行
govern统治,支配+ment行为或结果等→n.政府
harass烦恼+ment行为或结果等→n.骚扰,扰乱;烦恼,烦乱

stems_affixes.value_cn: 经营,管理;处理,操纵;管理部门
stems_affixes.word_buile: manage管理+ment行为或结果等→n.经营,管理;处理,操纵;管理部门
measure测量+ment行为或结果等→n.测量法,度量
move移动+ment行为或结果等→n.运动,活动;移动,迁移
pay支付+ment行为或结果等→n.付款,支付,报酬
pre预先+dica命令+ment行为或结果等→预先命令做→进入困境
refine精炼,精制+ment行为或结果等→n.精致,文雅,精巧

stems_affixes.value_cn: 点心,饮料,精力恢复,爽快
stems_affixes.word_buile: refresh使清新+ment行为或结果等→精力恢复,爽快→点心,饮料
commence开始+ment行为或结果等→开始→毕业典礼[开始新的旅程]
